name: Hex Hell
description:
EPILEPSY WARNING (contains flashing lights).

This is a game I'm doing for a uni project.
You press "A" and "D" to move or the left and right arrows, or the left and right side of the screen if you're playing on a touch-screen.
You can press "R" on the Game Over screen to restart the level faster and the "Escape" key to access the menu.

Don't press quit while playing on the browser, as you'll have to clear your browser cookies to be able to play again. The button is fully functional on the other platforms, just not in the browser.

Hope you like the game.
